choose.when: WHERE subject LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%') OR writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{words}, '%')

mapper.select:
SELECT division, aid, subject, writer, hit, fileOriName, ref, re_step, re_level, date_format(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') as regdate, (SELECT count(*) FROM gat_freecomment_${boardCode} c WHERE c.aid = a.aid ) AS cnt FROM gat_noticearticle_${boardCode} a
ORDER BY division DESC, ref DESC, re_step ASC LIMIT #{start}, #{end}
mapper.update: UPDATE gat_noticearticle_${boardCode} SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE aid = #{aid}

UPDATE gat_noticearticle_${boardCode} SET division = #{division}, subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, regdate = now(), fileName = #{fileName}, fileOriName = #{fileOriName}, fileUrl = #{fileUrl} WHERE aid = #{aid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gat_freearticle_${boardCode} SET division=#{division},subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, regdate = NOW(), fileName = #{fileName}, fileOriName = #{fileOriName}, fileUrl = #{fileUrl}, ref = #{ref}, re_step = #{re_step} + 1, re_level = #{re_step} + 1
